structure.unit: Disclosure And Regulation Of Campaign Expenditures And Contributions

law.catch_line: Contributions From Political Action Committees; Limitations

text.section: a candidate for governor, including contributions jointly to such candidate for governor and a candidate for lieutenant governor in a state election—one hundred and fifty thousand dollars;
a candidate for lieutenant governor—thirty-one thousand, two hundred and fifty dollars;
a candidate for attorney general—sixty-two thousand, five hundred dollars;
a candidate for state secretary, state treasurer, and state auditor—thirty-seven thousand, five hundred dollars;

a candidate for state senator, county commissioner, governor’s councillor, district attorney, clerk of courts, register of probate, registrar of deeds or any other county officer—eighteen thousand, seven hundred and fifty dollars;
a candidate for state representative—seven thousand, five hundred dollars.
